function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of consideration for virus transmission in early design evaluation","Impact":"Increased risk of contagion and public health hazards in newly constructed buildings","Mitigation":"Incorporate virus transmission simulations and risk assessments in early design evaluation stages","Technologies":"Simulation software with virus transmission modeling capabilities","People":"Architects, designers, and decision-makers involved in building design","Owner":"Architects, design teams, and building owners"},{"Description":"Inadequate analysis of space occupancy and human behavior","Impact":"Inaccurate understanding of human behavior and occupancy patterns, leading to suboptimal building designs","Mitigation":"Utilize simulation tools for space occupancy and behavior analysis, integrate data from multiple disciplines to inform design decisions","Technologies":"Simulation software for space occupancy modeling, data analysis tools for behavioral insights","People":"Architects, designers, and researchers in human-computer interaction and architecture","Owner":"Architects, design teams, and building owners"},{"Description":"Reliance on already constructed and occupied environments for research","Impact":"Limitation in preventing hazard scenarios (e.g., virus transmission) and designing for optimal occupant experiences","Mitigation":"Integrate simulation-driven design evaluation to inform decision-making in the earliest stages, leverage knowledge from multiple disciplines for proactive hazard prevention","Technologies":"Simulation software for early design evaluation, interdisciplinary data integration tools","People":"Researchers, architects, and designers","Owner":"Research institutions, design teams, and building owners"}]}
